title: 96. Sara Anne Bushland - The Unresolved Disappearance
description:
TICKETS FOR MWMH LIVE EVENT and pre-sale merchandise: momenthouse.com/murderwithmyhusband
On this episode of MWMH, Payton and Garrett discuss the disappearance of 15-year-old Sara Bushland.
*this case discusses child sexual assault*
Case Sources:
https://charleyproject.org/case/sara-anne-bushland
